api.title: Something went wrong. Our apologies.
api.detail: We are unable to proceed at this moment. Please try again later.

precontractDisagree.title: Your consent is required in order to proceed
precontractDisagree.detail: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to call us or visit a branch near you.

contractDisagree.title: Your consent is required in order to proceed
contractDisagree.detail: You're just moments from activating your Smart Banka. Your agreement to the Product Terms and Conditions and Agreement signature is required. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about it.

hard.title: We are unable to open a Family account for you
hard.detail: After reviewing the application, we cannot offer Family account to you.

branch.title: We are unable to open a Family account for you
branch.detail: After reviewing the application, we cannot offer Family account to you.

insufficient.title: Please visit one of our branches as we are unable to help you here
insufficient.detail: We will be happy to assist you in person.
insufficient.bulletsSectionTitle: Please remember to bring with you:
bullets: your child´s Czech passport or ID card (ID card only for children over 15 years old)

longTermProcess.title: We are almost finished.
longTermProcess.detail: We will review everything and notify you when everything is ready.

help.title: Do you need help or do you wish to finish the application later?
help.bulletsHeadline: Why open a Family account in MONETA?

iconBullets.text: Teach your children to manage personal finances
Set limits and make payments and savings easy

intro.title: An account in your mobile app for you and your children to teach them how to manage money
intro.detail: Allow your children to manage their personal finances. Teach them financial responsibility in a safe and controlled way, and in a familiar environment.

missingId.title: Oops, we can't open an account without a second ID.
missingId.subtitle: To open a child's account, we need to see the child's ID card or passport (from 15 years of age only).

birthCert.title: Oops, you have to be listed on the child's birth certificate to open an account
birthCert.subtitle: Unfortunately, if your child does not have you on their birth certificate, you cannot set up an account for them.

sections.title: The child learns to know the value of money

items.text: Instant account visibility for you and your child on your phones
Set limits and make payments and savings easy

sections.title: You can see all transaction in your Smart Banka
sections.header: In your Smart Banka, you can see all transactions and a balances in your child's account.

sections.title: A new way to look at allowance
sections.header: Transfer money, give allowance or make it easier for grandparents to chip in at anytime.

items.text: Suggested allowance based on child's age

sections.title: Payment card, savings, and an account until adulthood.

items.text: Attractive interest rate for savings account

sections.title: To open a Family account, you will need

items.text: Czech passport or ID card of the child
items.info: Does the child have no passport or ID, or only foreign citizenship?
Not listed on the child's birth certificate?

items.text: Child must be over 8 years old

intro.primaryButton: Open a Family account free of charge

uploadBirthCertificateIntro.title: Now, we will verify the child's identity
uploadBirthCertificateIntro.primaryButton: Take a picture of the birth certificate

items.text:
Photo of birth certificate
Take a picture of the Czech birth certificate of the child.

Photo of other form of ID
Take a photo of the child's passport or ID card (ID cards are mandatory for minors over 15 years of age).

uploadBirthCertificateScanner.title: Take a photo of the birth certificate
uploadBirthCertificateScanner.detail: It must be valid, well-lit and legible.

childInputSection.title: Child's information
childInputSection.info: Phone number is used to confirm internet payments (3-D Secure). If you do not want your child to use internet payments, you can block it in the following steps.

parentInputSection.title: Your information
parentInputSection.info: To receive important information about your child's account

consentSection.title: In order to communicate without delay

unencryptedCommunication.title: We can call and email you
unencryptedCommunication.secondary: I consent to MONETA communicating with my child in a regular, unencrypted manner via e-mail and phone.

instantMessaging.title: We can use chatt
instantMessaging.secondary: I consent to unencrypted communication with Moneta via WhatsApp and other instant messaging applications.

marketingConsent.title: Keep you up-to-date.
marketingConsent.secondary: I consent to my child's information being processed in order to receive tailored offers from Moneta. You can cancel anytime.

personalData.title: By continuing, I consent to the information regarding the opening of a current account being sent in an unencrypted manner to the above-mentioned email address and phone number. I also agree to the Personal Data Processing of MONETA Group.

confirmedChildSelection.title: For which child are we creating an account?
confirmedChildSelection.detail: You can open accounts for other children after this one is established
confirmedChildSelection.info: We have this data from documents you have previously provided to us

uploadBirthCertificateBusyLoader.title: Just a moment
uploadBirthCertificateBusyLoader.detail: It should not take more than a couple of seconds

birthCertficateNumber.title: Birth Certificate Number
birthCertficateNumber.info: It is 4 sets of numbers – Volume, Year, Page, Serial Number (all can be found in the top half of the birth certificate).

victoryError.title: We cannot open an account for your child at the moment

wrongBirthNumberVictory.title: Unable to proceed with this birth number

uploadDocumentSimpleLoader.title: Processing, just a moment.
uploadDocumentSimpleLoader.detail: This should only take a second.

uploadDocumentIntroChoice.title: Take a photo of the second ID document of the child
uploadDocumentIntroChoice.detail: Two forms of ID help us verify the identity of the child.
uploadDocumentIntroChoice.tertiaryButton: Child does not have either passport or ID card.

uploadDocumentIntroID.title: Take a photo of the ID card of the child
uploadDocumentIntroID.detail: ID card helps us verify the identity of the child.
uploadDocumentIntroID.tertiaryButton: Child does not have an ID card

uploadDocumentNoDocuments.title: We need two forms of ID
uploadDocumentNoDocuments.detail: A Family account can only be open using 2 forms of ID.

uploadDocumentScannerID1.title: Take a photo of the front side of the ID card
uploadDocumentScannerID1.detail: The ID card must be valid and the photo well-lit and legible.

uploadDocumentScannerID2.title: Take a photo of the back side of the ID card
uploadDocumentScannerID2.detail: The ID card must be valid and the photo well-lit and legible

uploadDocumentScannerPassport.title: Take a photo of the child's passport
uploadDocumentScannerPassport.detail: The passport must be valid and the photo well-lit and legible.

uploadDocumentResultNok.title: Family Account cannot be opened right now

uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.title: Oops, this did not work out.
uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.detail: Try taking the photo again, and make sure it's well-lit, clear and legible.

uploadDocumentBusyLoader.title: Processing, just a moment.
uploadDocumentBusyLoader.detail: This should only take a couple of seconds.

documentDetails.title: Information from the ID document of the child

personalData.title: Your information will be verified in the basic registers. You can find out more about register on the website of Basic Registers Management and Moneta . By clicking Continue, you confirm that all provided information is factual, complete, correct, and up-to-date.

uploadDocumentReviewCorrection.title: Some information seems to be incorrect
uploadDocumentReviewCorrection.detail: Some provided information does not match the found information. Please double check it and correct it.

uploadParentIDInVerificationVictory.title: Processing the uploaded ID card of the parent

contactAddress.title: Where to send the payment card of the child?

virtualCard.title: A virtual card in smartphone will be enough.
virtualCard.detail: Instead of a physical plastic card, a virtual card will be issued. Information for use in ATMs and for internet payments can be found in Internet Banka and Smart Banka.

addressSection.title: Contact address
addressSection.info: We recommend your address be listed as contact address

amlQuestionnaire.title: Information required by law

questions.secondaryTitle: We are legally obligated to ask for this information under Act No. 253/2008 Coll. on money laundering.

depositOrigin.title: Where will the money in the child's account come from?

options.infoText: Benefits from health insurance, pension insurance, social security benefits, orphan's pension,...

prevailingTransactions.title: What will the most common type of transaction be in the account?

rangeOfIncome.title: What will be the average monthly amount received into the child's account?

amlQuestionnaire.taxResidence: Is the child a tax resident of any other country?

pep.text: Is the child a politically exposed person?

info.title: What is a politically exposed person?

detail.title: Politically exposed person
detail.subtitleOne: A politically exposed person is an individual who holds a prominent public position or role in a government body or international organization, either in the Czech Republic or abroad.
detail.subtitleTwo: e.g., Prime Minister, Member of Parliament, prominent head of local government, judge of the Supreme or Constitutional Court, member of the central bank's bank board, senior officer of the armed forces, ...

section.title: A politically exposed person is also any
textRows: Member of immediate family of said person (e.g., parent, child, sibling, spouse...)
Partner or the beneficial owner of the same legal person or trust fund as said person or a person who has any other close business relationship with said person
Beneficiary ohner of a legal person or a trust fund created on belhal or for benefit for said person

amlQuestionnaire.pepDescription: Why is your child a politically exposed person?

cardLimits.title: Child's card settings
cardLimits.subtitle: A payment card gives you better control over your child's spending, and your child will keep up with their peers.

otherLimits.title: Bank transfer
otherLimits.subtitle: You can allow your child to make bank transfers. You can also set a limit above which the transaction will require your approval. The limit does not include transfers between current and savings accounts of the child.

paymentSection.title: Limit for transfers
paymentSection.secondaryTitle: The monthly limit is an amount which the child can transfer monthly. Including payments approved by you.

inOtherAccountsSection.title: Parent approval for transfers
inOtherAccountsSection.secondaryTitle: Transfers greater than the amount you enter below will require parent approval. Smaller amounts can be transferred without parent's approval.
inOtherAccountsSection.info: If you wish to approve all transfers, enter CZK0.

busyLoader.title: Just a second, processing.
busyLoader.detail: It will only take a couple of seconds.

inManualVerification.title: We are almost finished
inManualVerification.detail: We need to review everything, and will notify you when it is ready.

genericError.title: We cannot currently open a Family account for you

precontractBusyLoader.title: We are almost finished! Now just sign the agreements.
precontractBusyLoader.detail: Just give us a moment to prepare them.

section.title: Read through these documents
section.footer: All documents can be found in My Documents in Smart Banka

sign.title: Enter PIN to sign the Agreement

checkVictoryBusyLoader.title: Now it is our turn to sign
checkVictoryBusyLoader.detail: This should only take a moment.

done.title: You have successfully opened a Family account
done.detail: Use it to the fullest and connect it to your phone or tablet.

waiting.title: We're almost finished.
waiting.detail: We will review everything and let you know when it is ready.

insufficient.title: We were unable to open Family account for you

sections.title: On their phone or tablet:
textRows: On its home screen, select Link with QR Code
Scan or write the activation code you see above into your child's device
Your child will choose their PIN that they will use to log in and confirm transaction.

sections.title: On this device:
textRows: Enter PIN to confirm the entire process

pages.title: Savings
pages.detail: Learning to save is a crucial part of financial education of your child. A child of this age should save about 20% of their allowance to save up for what they want to buy.

sections.title: Basic guidelines

items.text: Monitor transfers from current account to savings account

sections.footer: You can enable automatic allowance in Settings, Allowance.

connectVictory.title: Done. Do you wish to send your child their first virtual allowance?
connectVictory.subtitle: Children learn to manage finances when they have access to them. Send them their allowance now and teach them how to manage it.
connectVictory.tip: When enabling automatic allowance, we offer guidelines on the optimal amount.

allowanceVictory.secondarySubtitle: If you are interested, we can show you tips on how to teach your child to manage their finances.
